CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec
M talks in a very low voise; seems intimidated by camera; MAY NOT BE USABLE

u.a: C places cups after M gives them to her
C picks up a lid; tries to fit it on teapot
M takes lid off teapot; C puts right lid on
C tries to put lid that was on teapot on another container; it does not fit; holds it up
C touches a pot and looks at M
C moves some pots; reaches for a container; lid fits on it
C pours with pitcher in cup
C points at spoon across table
M helps C get out of her chair
C points at toy near M
C walks to other side of table
C puts a knife near M; C picks up a lid
C sits back down at table
C picks up a pot to try lid on; drops pot; gets up and stands while setting pot on table to put lid on; it fits; picks up another pot
M starts to open the garage
M moves toys out of garage
C gets up to close garage
C lifts a chair toward the house; M takes it from her and puts in house
M tries to help C open garage
M moves toys away; brings something out of garage
C sits down in her chair
C moves toy out of the way .
C drives car to garage; opens garage; drives car in; closes garage; sits down in chair
M indicates for C to turn pages back to beginning
M makes a disapproving noise; taps C on head
M and C turn their attention to opposite page
M moves C back in her chair
M moves C's hand out of the way of the picture
C turns last page and closes book
M points at picture on back cover
M opens nursery rhyme book; C moves it closer to both
C starts to open nursery rhyme book again; knocks another book on floor
C picks up book from floor
C makes a noise when she moves in her chair
C reaches across M for CareBear book; opens it
they have the CareBear feelings book
